headline: How Analyst Focus on AI Monetization and Upmarket Expansion Will Impact monday.com (MNDY) Investors
summary: In recent days, analysts at Jefferies, Citi, and BTIG updated their views on monday.com, emphasizing its focus on AI monetization, expansion beyond core work management, and resilience amid a cautious software demand backdrop. Across these reports, a common thread is monday.com's push upmarket and into additional product areas, which could meaningfully influence how investors think about its long-term growth mix and customer base. Next, we'll examine how the emphasis on monday.com's 2026 AI...

headline: Why Sampo (HLSE:SAMPO) Story Is Shifting With A Higher Target But Neutral Rating
summary: Sampo Oyj’s fair value estimate has been nudged to €10.665 from €10.64357, while the discount rate and core growth assumptions remain almost unchanged. This small adjustment reflects a slightly more confident yet still measured view tied to a higher €9.91 price target, with analysts keeping a Neutral stance that points to balanced risk and reward. Read on to see what this means for you as the Sampo Oyj story evolves and how you can stay on top of future shifts in the narrative. Analyst Price...
